job_description:
• Experience with a cloud environment and services (e.
• A background in biology is not required, but curiosity and scientific interest is.
• Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, math, or scientific discipline and 2 years of software development OR 4 years of professional experience building software.
• Experience developing web applications in React and Redux.
• Experience with shipping and maintaining software.
• Strong understanding of computer science fundamentals (e.
• Data structures, space and time complexity) Deep understanding of testing, build, continuous integration, deployment & continuous monitoring.
• AWS) Willingness to solve problems irrespective of where it is in the tech stack.

• Execute production operations according to defined procedures and ensure the integrity and quality of our products Ability to operate and maintain laboratory to clean room standards required in the production of Life Science products Process work orders accurately using an ERP system in a timely manner Maintenance of production batch records and good documentation under ISO requirement Accurate tracking of production data, test data and inventory Assembly of 10x consumables and finished goods both manually and using semi-automated packaging equipment Ability to set up and operate packaging equipment and handle simple troubleshooting Perform preventive maintenance on some lab equipment Provide feedback to improve process quality and efficiency Identify issues occurring in production labs and escalate issues to supervisor’s or MSE’s attention High school education / Associate Degree or above Strong team player and detail oriented Good communication skills Ability to read and understand SOPs and equipment user manual Ability to enter data into electronic tracking systems like Excel Ability to multi-task and prioritize work load to meet strict deadlines under supervision Good documentation skills and ability to write procedures and reports Desire to be part of a rapidly evolving organization and taking products and processes to the next level Ability to lift up to 15 pounds and potentially stand or sit for up to 3 hour increments Experience in automation and packaging of Life Science products, Food Packaging products or related field preferred Relevant experience in a production environment working with standard production control tools – ERP, inventory control, and work orders Experience training employees on production processes defined in production batch records and work instructions Experience writing and revising work instructions and production batch records Experienced in communicating and collaborating with production departments Quality Systems California, USA HQScientificPosted a month agoSoftware Engineer III, Instrument SoftwarePleasanton, California, USA HQEngineering - SoftwarePosted 6 months agoSenior Software Engineer, Instrument Software Pleasanton, California, USA HQEngineering - SoftwarePosted 10 days ago.

• Or equivalent experience strongly preferred.
• Experience in sample preparation for Single Cell assays: cell culture, tissue dissociation, enrichment, flow cytometry, nuclei isolation.
• Prior experience in customer-facing technical support roles.
• With >3 years of relevant experience.
• Strong background in troubleshooting experimental workflows in a laboratory setting.
• Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and interpersonal skills.
• Provide expert scientific guidance on the use and applications of 10x Genomics products.
• Deliver direct application support and troubleshooting assistance to customers and Field Applications Teams.

• Engaging external vendors to integrate their solutions into 10X codebase Designing and developing embedded control software and firmware for cutting edge high-throughput biological instrumentation platforms Working with electrical engineers to develop functional drivers and appropriate control schemes and interfaces Negotiating/determining prototype requirements with design engineers from partner teams (e.
• Mechanical Engineering, Optical Engineering, Electrical Engineering) Designing and implementing automated test scripts built on top of your control software Contributing to the entire software lifecycle from requirements gathering to validation Writing well structured, testable, efficient and maintainable software Writing software to control hardware prototypes Writing drivers and low level hardware control software Developing application level business logic (e.
• Dispense, measure, aspirate) Developing small but interactive engineering GUIs For example: given hardware you have never used, quickly write a python interface to control it Working experience with Machine Vision or Scientific cameras, GenICam/GenTL stack over USB3Vision, GigE Vision, CXP, CameraLink Grasp of the basics of classical control theory and experience implementing control algorithms (e.
• ) Rapid software prototyping & validation with attention to detail and engineering diligence Strong analytical and problem-solving skills Strong verbal and written communication skills Formal approach to design & architecture of complex instruments/systems Background in biology and DNA sequencing is not required.
• Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, math, or scientific discipline with 4 years experience.
• OR Master’s degree with 2 years of experience in software development Embedded/Firmware Development Modern C++ Python3 Linux Senior Software Engineer, Instrument Software Pleasanton, California, USA HQEngineering - SoftwarePosted 10 days agoStaff Software EngineerPleasanton, California, USA HQEngineering - SoftwareRemotePosted 18 days agoSenior Software Engineer, Infrastructure EngineeringPleasanton, California, USA HQIT & Productivity EngineeringPosted 7 months agoSenior Software Engineer, AI SolutionsCalifornia, USA (Remote)Engineering - SoftwarePosted 3 months agoStaff Software Engineer, AI SolutionsCalifornia, USA (Remote)Engineering - SoftwarePosted 3 months agoSoftware Engineer III, FrontendPleasanton, California, USA HQEngineering - SoftwarePosted 2 months agoStaff Mechanical Engineer, Precision Motion ControlPleasanton, California, USA HQEngineering - HardwarePosted 2 months agoSenior Security Engineer, CloudPleasanton, California, USA HQIT & Productivity EngineeringHybridPosted 17 days agoSenior Manufacturing Test Engineer (Contractor) (P-4758)Pleasanton, California, USA HQScientificPosted a month agoSenior Manufacturing Engineer (Contractor) (P-4757)Pleasanton, California, USA HQScientificPosted a month ago.
• Designing, profiling, optimizing and troubleshooting image acquisition pipelines, moving gigabytes of data per second.
• PID, lead-lag, MPC) Exposure to digital signals processing (DSP) such as simple signal conditioning (e.

job_title: Data Governance Engineer - Data Governance Engineering
job_description:
• Minimum QualificationsB.
• In Computer Science or related field with 4+ years of software development experience, including exposure to ML/AI applicationsProduction experience in Python or similar languages, with familiarity in data processing and API developmentUnderstanding of distributed systems and cloud platforms, including basic ML model deploymentExperience with containerization (Docker), orchestration (Kubernetes), and infrastructure as code (e.
• Terraform, CloudFormation)Proficiency in CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices using Git, GitHub Actions/Jenkins/GitLab CI, with experience in automated testing and deployment workflowsFamiliarity with observability and monitoring tools (e.
• Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog) and logging frameworks for production systemsIntermediate knowledge of machine learning concepts and MLOps, including data pipelines, model versioning, and experiment tracking tools.
